data.current_description: Create a email with the given properties and return a copy of the object, including the ID. Documentation and examples for creating standard emails is provided.
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new email object with the provided properties. Accepts a SimplePublicObjectInputForCreate request body containing the email properties to set. Returns the created email as a SimplePublicObject with an assigned ID and timestamp. The email is immediately persisted to the system.

Accepts a batch request containing email objects with identifier properties.
